name: Tiki Balm for Lips
description:
If your lips feel like you made out with a cheese grater try Tiki Balm. Avocado oil and mango butter work together to soften and pamper your lips. Never waxy!

Why it's awesome:

Mango butter - Contains quercetin, mangiferin and tannins.These have anti-oxidant, anti-fungal and anti-inflammatory properties, all without feeling greasy or gross.

Castor oil - Light oil that sinks into your skin, with antibacterial, antifungal and analgesic properties.

Avocado oil - Very rich in Vitamins B, A and E which help with skin protection and regeneration. Also offers protection and anti-oxidizing properties.

Ingredients: Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cera Alba, Lanolin, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Emulsifying Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Dimethicone, Sodium Lactate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Hexylene Glycol
